title: CM expresses grief over loss of lives
content:
LAHORE, Jul 03 (APP):Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar has expressed a deep sense of sorrow over the loss of precious human lives due to collision between a train and the van near Farooqabad.
In a condolence message here on Friday, he has extended sympathies
to the bereaved heirs and directed the health department to provide the
best treatment facilities to the injured.
